question: What type of cuisine are you interested in?
Do you have any dietary restrictions or preferences?
Are you looking for a specific meal type? (e.g., breakfast, lunch, dinner)
Are there any specific ingredients you want to include or avoid?
How much time do you have for cooking? (e.g., 30 minutes, 1 hour)
What's your cooking skill level? (e.g., beginner, intermediate, expert)
How many servings do you need?
Do you have a favorite cuisine?
Do you have any food allergies?
Do you have a preferred cooking method? (e.g., baking, grilling, frying)
How spicy do you like your food? (e.g., mild, medium, hot)
Do you have a budget for ingredients?
Is this for a special occasion?
Are you looking for healthy options?
Do you want to make extra for leftovers?
Do you have any special kitchen equipment? (e.g., slow cooker, air fryer)
What time do you usually have your meals?
Do you have any other preferences or requirements?
